snippet: Business owners in seaside resort towns like Italy’s Forte dei Marmi worry that further sanctions could hurt business, but so far the reach of big Russian money seems little affected.
abstract: Forte Dei Marmi Journal; business leaders in Forte Dei Marmi on Italy's Tuscan coast express relief that wealthy Russians are continuing to travel to seaside resort town; round of economic sanctions by United States and Europe in response to Russian aggression in Ukraine, intended to cripple individuals and institutions close to Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin, has so far had little effect on the reach of Russian money.
lead_paragraph: Business owners in seaside resort towns like Italy’s Forte dei Marmi worry that further sanctions could hurt business, but so far the reach of big Russian money seems little affected.

headline.main: Despite Sanctions, Cash Keeps Flowing at Playground for Russia’s Rich
headline.print_headline: Despite Sanctions, Cash Keeps Flowing at Playground for Russia’s Rich
